        "children": {
            "follow": {
                "value": false,
                "type": "added"

                "value": "Value 1",
                "type": "unchanged"

                    "key": "value"

                "type": "updated"

                "value": "blah blah",
                "type": "added"
            },

                "value": {
                    "key5": "value5"
                },
                "type": "added"
            },
            "setting6": {
                "children": {
                    "doge": {
                        "children": {
                            "wow": {
                                "previus_value": "",
                                "value": "so much",
                                "type": "updated"
                            }
                        },
                        "type": "nested"
                    },
                    "key": {
                        "value": "value",
                        "type": "unchanged"
                    },
                    "ops": {
                        "value": "vops",
                        "type": "added"
                    }
                },
                "type": "nested"
            }
        },
        "type": "nested"
    },
    "group1": {
        "children": {
            "baz": {
                "previus_value": "bas",
                "value": "bars",
                "type": "updated"
            },
            "foo": {
                "value": "bar",
                "type": "unchanged"
            },
            "nest": {
                "previus_value": {
                    "key": "value"
                },
                "value": "str",
                "type": "updated"
            }
        },
        "type": "nested"
    },

        "value": {
            "abc": 12345,
            "deep": {
                "id": 45
            }
        },
        "type": "removed"

        "value": {
            "deep": {
